# Onboarding

Welcome to Icarus!

## Setup

Clone the repo:

```bash
gh repo clone lostmygithubaccount/Icarus
```

Change into it:
    
```bash
cd Icarus
```

## Installation

[Install `just`](https://github.com/casey/just). Then:

```bash
just setup
```

And activate the virtual environment:

```bash
. .venv/bin/activate
```

Then the `icarus` CLI is available. Use it to generate data and run stuff.

## Generating synthetic data

Run:

```bash
icarus gen
```

## Running ETL

Run:

```bash
icarus etl
```

## Open application

Run:

```bash
icarus app
```
